pullrequest.title: issue #24, AtlasRobotInterface Tutorial for updated v3.0.0

content.raw: Hi guys, you are of course correct, the AtlasRobotInterface is solely available through the teams' portals.  That's not a secret, feel free to say that.  I doubt it will ever become available via any other means.  I'm surprised you are both involved with AtlasRobotInterface and a tutorial since it is obviously only available to a small community and they have for sure already installed and are using it.
content.html: Hi guys, you are of course correct, the AtlasRobotInterface is solely available through the teams' portals. That's not a secret, feel free to say that. I doubt it will ever become available via any other means. I'm surprised you are both involved with AtlasRobotInterface and a tutorial since it is obviously only available to a small community and they have for sure already installed and are using it.
